item.description: Setting up Quartus on linux I had some problems setting up Quartus on ubuntu 16.04, so here’s a short tutorial. My board is a DE10-Lite, and I’m using the Linux edition of Quartus Prime Lite, 18.1 update 646. I’m writing this quite a while after the fact, but I seem to remember that I had to register an account to download the software. The installation seemed to go without issue if I remember correctly, but that ended when I tried to program my board.
